name: First Infusion
description:
A teenager diagnosed with a chronic illness has his first treatment at an infusion center in this short and sweet narrative game

Made in two days for the RIT Jam for Hope. Special thanks to RIT MAGIC, Dennis McCorry, Zach Sheikh, and the Dear Jack Foundation for making this game jam happen!

Made in GB Studio. Downloads available for Analogue Pocket and .ROM files for playing on a Game Boy emulator or on actual Game Boy hardware. A game by Trent Garlipp Music by Nick "Baschfire" Basch
